author: wrowe
msg: Windows 9x file locks will *never* block.  Emulate this behavior
in a very crufty loop.
Although better than nothing, this code easily creates a starved
child waiting for a high-utilization lock.  Since Win9x is marginally
supported, create expected faults rather than unexpected failures.
Author: inoue <inoue ariel-networks.com>, wrowe
Backport: 377054

author: rpluem
msg: * Do not remove the connection headers from r->headers_in. They are needed
by the http output filter to create the correct connection response headers.
Instead work on a copy of r->headers_in.

author: kevan
msg: Fix spec versions

author: costin
msg: A couple of small improvements to the 'embeded' tomcat sandbox. Now it
can work with only web.xml - or no xml files at all.
